articles.description: And the same rule applies to 750,000 households across the UK.
articles.content:
Boris Johnson and his partner Carrie Symonds will be legally allowed to meet another household indoors due to this loophole (Picture: Getty Images)

articles.author: Nick Enoch
articles.title: Tesco shopper left in tears after 'young girl in red jumper' pays for her £69 Christmas shopping - Daily Mail
articles.description: Paula Fletcher, from Aigburth, Liverpool, was waiting at the till at her local Tesco in Park Road when she discovered there was a problem with her PIN, even though she had sufficient funds.
articles.content:
A mother whose bank card was inexplicably blocked at a supermarket checkout sat down and cried after a kind-hearted stranger paid for her Christmas shopping.
